![Metasploit version](https://img.shields.io/badge/metasploit-v.4.x-green.svg?style=popout&logo=data:image/png;base64,)
![Metasploit Rubocop status](https://img.shields.io/badge/rubocop-passed-green.svg?style=popout&logo=data:image/png;base64,)


This repo contains a collection of [Metasploit](https://www.metasploit.com/) modules.

# Included modules

* Total.js < 3.2.4 Directory Traversal (CVE-2019-8903)
* Samsung SmartTV scanner

# How to

Cloning the repo

```
git clone https://github.com/fabiocogno/metasploit-modules.git
```

Copy the content to the local Metasploit directory

```
mkdir -p ~/.msf4 && cp -r metasploit-modules/modules ~/.msf4/
```
